inclusion.criterion: Children and adolescents with diabetes mellitus type 1
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Diabetic children with duration of diabetes < 1 year
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Children with chronic diseases, handicapped children, children with cancer, chronic renal impairment, or neurological diseases
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 57-year-old man with abdominal pain and vomiting. He drinks around 60 units of alcohol per week and smokes 22 cigarettes per day.
